name: How many mushrooms are there?
instruction:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-2-course-5-task-13.png)

Masha collected `mushroomCount` of mushrooms in the forest. Returning home, she found 15 more mushrooms.

Create a variable `mushroomCount` with the value `12`.

Write a command that increases the existing value of the `mushroomCount` variable by `15`.
